EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Platform Roadshow - CenturyLink_Q215.Atlanta - Week Before Re
EmailTemplate.subject: See you next Thursday at the Cloud Platform Seminar - Atlanta
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud Platform Seminar coming up next Thursday in Atlanta. We look forward to seeing you!
Please also bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Cloud Platform Seminar Thursday, September 10, 2015 8:30am - 4:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda
Tech on Fifth @Technology Square Georgia Tech Venture Center 75 Fifth Street, NW Atlanta, GA 30308 Map & Directions <https://www.google.com/maps/place/75+5th+St+NW,+Atlanta,+GA+30308/@33.7768584,-84.3897463,16.15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x88f5046654807d2f:0x242786f89bd138d7>
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git (http://git-scm.com/downloads <http://git-scm.com/downloads>) ("brew install git") - The Cloud Foundry CLI (https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases>) - download the latest! - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans)
QUESTIONS? Contact Kim Marie Ruquet at kruquet@pivotal.io <mailto:kruquet@pivotal.io> or via cell at 631-388-0569 <tel:631-388-0569>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal & CenturyLink team!
P.S.- Only a few spots remain! If you have a colleague interested in attending please forward on this link to the workshop details & registration <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-platform-seminar/atlanta>.
